contextId.occurrenceNote: This hypothetical statement tells what might have happened if Abner had not spoken wisely to Joab. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hypo]])
contextId.glQuote: if you had not said that ... pursued their brothers until the morning

contextId.occurrenceNote: The speaker is giving a hypothetical situation. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-hypo]])
contextId.glQuote: if Absalom had lived, and we all had died, then that would have pleased you
